content.rendered:
Directed by Rahul Dholakia.

Written by Rahul Dholakia. Harit Mehta. Niraj Shukla. Ashish Vashi.

Cast Shah Rukh Khan(Raees). Sunny Leone(Laila). Nawazuddin Siddiqui(IPS Majmudar (as Nawazuddin Siddique)). Jaideep Ahlawat(Nawab). Sheeba Chaddha(Raees’s Mother). Mahira Khan(Aasiya). Atul Kulkarni(Jairaj). Shahnawaz Pradhan(Ujjwalbhai). Pramod Pathak(Chief Minister). Anil Charanjeett(Qasim Mechanic). Raj Arjun(Ilyas). Mohd. Zeeshan Ayyub(Sadiq (as Zeeshan Ayub)). Suparna Marwah(Aasiya’s Mother (Ammi)). Anurag Arora(Damla). Saharsh Kumar Shukla(Popat (as Saharsh Shukla)). Pawan Singh(Lallah). Menaka(Mohalla Woman 2). Narendra Jha(Musa Bhai). Babita Anant(Mohalla Woman 5 (as Babita Dogra)). Uday Tikekar(Pashabhai). Sanjay Gurbaxani(Comissioner). Loveleen Mishra(Ratna Madam). Yusuf Hussain(Mill Manager). Nalneesh Neel(Lalji). Bhagwan Tiwari(Inspector Devji). Pranay Narayan(Ramnikbhai). Bachan Pachehra(Mill Worker 1 (as Bachchan Pachera)). Sanjay Bhatia(Coast Guard Officer). Vidushi Mehra(Mohalla Woman 4). Kaizaad Kotwal(Mill Owner). Mahendra Shrivas(Chandu). Ashutosh Jha(Rasul – Raee’s Punter 2). B Shantanu(Home Secretary (as B. Shantanu)). Rukhsana Behruzi(Mill Owner’s Wife). Ankur Jain(Reporter). Bimal Trivedi(Narol Chowkdi Truck Driver). Kundan Roy(Kalupor – Raee’s Punter #1). Niraj Shukla(Man on Rath). Helena Fonseca(Mohalla Woman 3). Shubham Chintamani(Young Raees). Nirmal Chaudhary(PA to CM). Utkarsh Mazumdar(Dr. Sajanwala). Sunil Upadhyay(Taufiq – Raee’s Punter 3). Rajiv Ranjan(Control Room Officer). Akshay Verma(Hansmukh Shah). Ajay Arya(Press Reporter (Birthday Party)). Libert Olivera(Porbandar PSI). Vinod Anand(Cop (Rally)). Kanishka Singh(Damla’s Truck Driver). Nalneesh(Lalji). Prasoon Narayan(Constable (Gandhi Ashram)). Karthik Chauhan(Ruffian 1). Narreshh Malikk(Newsreader 2 (as Naresh Malik)). Nishad Raj Rana(Officer (Ilyas’s Raid)). Sarika Degawkar(Reporter 2 (Press Conference)). Omkaar(Highway Officer). Fareed(Eijaz – Raee’s Punter 4). Parimal Desai(Judge). Mukesh Beher(Interrogation Cop 1). Shubham Tukaram(Young Sadiq). Viren Pandey(Interrogation Police Officer). Ashok(Constable (Ilyas’s Raid)). Ravi Verma(Salim Shooter). Reem(Mohalla Woman 1). Sagar(Young Kalupor (as Sagar – Dhai Akshar NGO)). Akash Sisodia(Musa’s Goon 3). Harshad Kumar(Inspector Patel). Baljinder Singh(Musa’s Goon 2). Rajiv Ranjan(Control Room Officer). Arihant(Police Station Cop 1). Ankur Jain(Reporter 3 (Press Conference)). Avinash Razdan(King George (Compounder)). Rajesh Barsewal(Jairaj’s Driver (as Rajesh Barsawal)). Ankur(Police Station Cop 2). Manish Rajput(Reporter 1 (Press Conference)). Amitesh(Interrogation Cop 2). Shekhar(Postman). Dharam Singh(Musa’s Goon 1). Yug(Young Taufiq (as Yug – Dhai Akshar NGO)). Aarav Mishra(Molotov Thrower). Tyrone Aviet(Dancer in song Laila O Laila (uncredited))

Producers Farhan Akhtar. Zakaria Alaoui. Vishal Bajaj. Abhijit Chawathe. Gauri Khan. Sunil Khedekar. Arunima Roy. Shivani Saran. Ritesh Sidhwani. Vinod Unnithan.

Production Excel Entertainment. Red Chillies Entertainmen.
